title: Create CAR MODEL-belongs-to-BRAND Relationship
user_story:
As an API contributor\
I want to be able to connect a BRAND to CAR MODELs\
So I can create car families
description:
# **Response**

**Happy path**

* positive HTTP status code (201)
* a simple JSON confirming that both entities have been connected:
  * `car_model_id`: integer
  * `brand_id`: integer
  * `relationship_id`: integer
  * `relationship_name`: string

**Unhappy path**

* negative HTTP status code (404)
* a plain text response stating the problem

# **Acceptance Criteria**

**Behavior (Business Logic)**

* the relationship is not created in error case
* an error message when the provided data was not valid
  * 404 when `brand` or `car model` were not found
* the relationship is successfully created when provided with valid data
* the user can trigger the creation of the same relationship over and over again
  * the result is always the same (idempotency)
  * the relation may be recreated in the database, but the `More Cars ID` needs to stay the same
* each car model can only belong to one brand
  * when a new brand is assigned the original relationship will be removed

# **NOT in scope for this iteration**

* auth / security
* proper JSON structure according to the JSON:API
* returning the relationships in other places
* deleting the relationship
